short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Test REST APIs with ease using this Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension to test REST APIs on web browser only. No need to use different software and tools for that, now you can test your REST APIs in the browser only while testing the other things.
